Html:
Hello, when comes the next updates ? Tabbed MDI, RibbonBar, german-language ... ?
bye
Martin

Sorry, all the project members had a spike in the demands of their day jobs pretty much at the same time. I have another couple of weeks of long hours on my current project and then things get better.

The RC of the current controls should be out by end of day tomorrow. There is just a little testing yet to go.

I’ve started on some of the new controls and will have a CTP available late in October. I’m considering doing a nightly or weekly build on the new release. I’m a little worried about breaking changes if I expose daily builds. We strive hard to not have any breaking changes on anything released to the public but in day to day development they happen. I wouldn’t mind some feedback on this from the community.

I will get with Martin to see where the German translation stands.

Thanks,
Scorn
